claim_card.claim: A PoLA-based argument is made that biology is a poor long-horizon carrier in space, while recursive patterning can survive substrate shifts.
claim_card.test_hook: Compare survivability constraints of biology vs encoded cognition (redundancy, repairability, replication latency) under high-radiation / long-duration scenarios.
claim_card.evidence_excerpt: PoLA guarantees biologyâ€™s fragility in space
